item.title: CVE-2024-3817|2024-04-17T19:37:25.878Z -- HashiCorp -- Shared library
item.description:
HashiCorpâ€™s go-getter library is vulnerable to argument injection when executing Git to discover remote branches.
This vulnerability does not affect the go-getter/v2 branch and package.
